price: Isaan “Rabbiin ilma qaba” jedhan sodaachisuuf (isa buuse).
arabic: وَيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wayundhira alladhīna qālū ittakhadha al-lahu waladan
